General.Name: Anhui Xinbo Aluminum Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Xinbo Aluminum Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aluminum alloy profiles. It offers aluminum products in the areas new energy, energy-saving buildings, automobiles, household appliances, electronic, electric power, aviation, aerospace, machinery manufacturing, shipbuilding, and chemical industries. The company also provides auto part profiles, solar photovoltaic modules, rail transit part profiles, air conditioner, refrigerator, automatic assembly line profiles, radiator profiles, LED lighting profiles, motor housing profiles, ship profiles, and purification profiles. Anhui Xinbo Aluminum Co., Ltd. was founded in 2013 and is based in Tianchang, China.
